did.abstract: An 1895 letter sent from George G. Brown, Secretary of the Brooklyn Department of Public Instruction, to John L. Rider, Supervisor of Flatlands, regarding Flatlands School District No. 2.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection consists of a single document.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: George G. Brown letter to John L. Rider regarding Brooklyn Board of Education allotment of funds, 1895, 1977.501, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Public Library, Center for Brooklyn History.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection was rehoused and the finding aid revised by Dee Bowers in 2023.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Letter sent from George G. Brown, Secretary of the Brooklyn Department of Public Instruction, to John L. Rider, Supervisor of Flatlands, regarding the Brooklyn Board of Education allotting $342.00 to the the trustees of Flatlands School District No. 2. The letter is dated July 10, 1895.
